publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1966 Mr Andrew Welsh: Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse—That the Parliament commends Angus Council for its role in the creation of the Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse, which instigated the Tayside Domestic Abuse Initiative, a working partnership that benefits the communities of Scotland, as highlighted in the Scottish Executive’s debate on domestic abuse services on 4 November 2004.
S2M-1966 Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse (lodged on 5 November 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-1966 Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse (lodged on 5 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1966 Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse (lodged on 5 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1966 Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse (lodged on 5 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan* R, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1966 Angus Partnership on Domestic Abuse (lodged on 5 November 2004) Ms Sandra White*
